ValidationRule.description: Checks if Assessment Outcome is successful before moving the stage to Development
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="International_Projects_Unit", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Assessment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Development"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Assessment_Outcome__c, "Successful")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure Assessment Outcome is successful in order to move the opportunity to Development stage or mark it as Discontinued.
